archimate:Requirement.name: PE.2.2.3e: e) up-to-date information related to information security issues (e.g. users' security requirements, emerging threats and newly discovered vulnerabilities) and tools (e.g. information risk assessment methodologies, forensic investigation software and an enterprise-wide security architecture)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
